name: Crazy Phrase Deluxe
description:
Crazy Phrase is the exhilarating, phrase-guessing party game that puts the fun in funny!

If you're a fan of Party games like Catch Phrase™, Taboo™, Guesstures™, Heads Up™, Scattergories™, or Charades, then you'll love Crazy Phrase!

Crazy Phrase turns any gathering into a party! And the best part is that you can take it with you anywhere, so a party is always just around the corner!

Overview:
Crazy Phrase is simple, fast, and tons of laugh-out-loud fun. Players try to get teammates to guess a secret phrase using verbal clues before time runs out. Once your team guesses the phrase, you pass the device to the opposing team and then its their turn to beat the timer. But you have to be quick! Hot Potato rules apply! Whichever team gets caught holding the device when the timer runs out loses the round, and the other team scores a point (two if they can guess the last word)!

Choose from all sorts of different fun categories including Idioms, Movie Titles, Songs, Famous People, and more… with new categories added all the time.

Features:
• Simple, fun gameplay
• Optimized for quick & spontaneous play
• Customize your game - Lots of easy to use options
• Favorite Categories? Hated Categories? Toggle individual categories on or off!
• Download new categories (added regularly)
• Exceptional visuals
• Endless fun and unforgettable memories!
